name: DOOMER'S ADVENTURE
description:
Do you remember when life brought you pleasure and you felt that something wonderful was waiting for you ahead?
Now every day is a struggle. Collect objects to somehow facilitate your existence in the hope of finding meaning in everything that happens.

Nightwalks and cigarettes.

• Unique atmosphere, known as "estetika ebenei" ("the middle of nowhere").
• Doomer music playlist.
• Pseudo-existential questions of being.
• 30 hand-made levels.
